_header: Farewell this world I take my leave forever
Note:
Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 407; for stanza 5 occurring separately see 1265.
_description: A Farewell to the World — five stanzas rhyme royal

OxfBal354.First Lines:
ffarewell this world I take me leve for euerI am arrestid to appere
                    affore godes face…
OxfBal354.Last Lines:
…Graunte me in paradise to haue a mancyounThat shede his blode
                    for me Redempsoun

CamTCC1157.First Lines:
ffare well this world I take my leve for euerI am arested to apere
                    at goddes face…
CamTCC1157.Last Lines:
…But at the last he yeveth hem a bablewhen his peynted
                        Cloth
